column1: Phalauda is a town and a nagar panchayat in Meerut district in the Indian state of Uttar Pradesh.
Phalauda is located at 29.187°N 77.829°E﻿ / 29.187; 77.829. It has an average elevation of 221 metres (725 feet).

column3: 200. Males constitute 53% of the population and females 47%. Phalauda has an average literacy rate of 49%
column4: lower than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 59%
column5: and female literacy is 38%. In Phalauda
column6: 19% of the population is under 6 years of age.
